article_title: Fears Hezbollah could respond after Hamas official killed.
sentence: Saleh  al-Arouri,  who  was  killed  in  Beirut,  was  the  most  senior  figure  from  Hamas  to  have  been  killed  since  the  Hamas  attacks  on  Israel  on  7  October.
